# image

**Instance Property**

The UIKit image object

## Declaration

```swift
var image: UIImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property is set using the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKImage/init(image:)] method. For image objects created using other methods, this property is `nil`.

## Getting the Image Data

- **imageData**: The data object containing the raw image data.
- **imageName**: The name of the image to load from the Watch app’s bundle.
